metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation Obfuscated IEX Invocation
metadata.comment: Detects all variations of obfuscated powershell IEX invocation code generated by Invoke-Obfuscation framework from the following code block

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND process.cmd_line rlike '\\$PSHome\\\[\\s*\\d\{1,3\}\\s*\\\]\\s*\\\+\\s*\\$PSHome\\\[' AND process.cmd_line rlike '\\$ShellId\\\[\\s*\\d\{1,3\}\\s*\\\]\\s*\\\+\\s*\\$ShellId\\\[' AND process.cmd_line rlike '\\$env:Public\\\[\\s*\\d\{1,3\}\\s*\\\]\\s*\\\+\\s*\\$env:Public\\\[' AND process.cmd_line rlike '\\$env:ComSpec\\\[\(\\s*\\d\{1,3\}\\s*,\)\{2\}' AND process.cmd_line rlike '\\*mdr\\*\\W\\s*\\\)\\.Name' AND process.cmd_line rlike '\\$VerbosePreference\\.ToString\\\(' AND process.cmd_line rlike '\\\[String\\\]\\s*\\$VerbosePreference')

output.summary: Detects all variations of obfuscated powershell IEX invocation code generated by Invoke-Obfuscation framework from the following code block
